properties.areaDesc: Menard, IL; Mason, IL; Cass, IL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 8:30PM CST until January 18 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Lincoln IL
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Illinois...

Sangamon River at Monticello affecting Piatt County
Sangamon River near Oakford affecting Cass...Mason and Menard
Counties
Sangamon River near Chandlerville affecting Cass and Mason Counties

.The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation, soil
moisture conditions, and forecast precipitation.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Sangamon River near Oakford.
* From Sunday evening until Saturday January 18.
* At 8 PM Saturday the stage was 465.5 feet.
* Flood stage is 471 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by tomorrow evening and continue
to rise to near 472.2 feet by early Tuesday morning. The river
will fall below flood stage by early Saturday morning.
* Impact...At 471 feet...Flooding begins to agricultural areas not
protected by levees.
properties.instruction:
If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternate
route. Turn around, don't drown.

Additional river and weather information is available at
www.weather.gov/ilx.
